rows.name: transitionMode
rows.description: This option is used to define the type of scheduler transition

rows.name: startWeekOn
rows.description: This option is used to set the start of the calendar week to Monday or Sunday

rows.name: defaultMode
rows.description: This option allows you to define the type of view to display

rows.name: minWidth
rows.description: This option allows you to define the minimum width of the container

rows.name: maxWidth
rows.description: This option allows you to define the maximum width of the container

rows.name: minHeight
rows.description: This option allows you to define the minimum height of the container

rows.name: maxHeight
rows.description: This option allows you to define the maximum height of the container

rows.name: reverseTimelineOrder
rows.description: This option allows you to define the order of events displayed in Timeline view

rows.name: locale
rows.description: This prop is used to set the locale of the scheduler

rows.name: events
rows.description: This prop sets event data

rows.name: legacyStyle
rows.description: This prop allows to use the old display style

rows.name: options
rows.description: This prop is used to set scheduler properties

rows.name: alertProps
rows.description: This prop is used to set scheduler properties

rows.name: toolbarProps
rows.description: This prop is used to set toolbar properties

rows.name: onEventsChange
rows.description: This event is fired when the event change occurs

rows.name: onCellClick
rows.description: This event is fired when a cell is clicked

rows.name: onTaskClick
rows.description: This event is fired when a task is clicked

rows.name: onAlertCloseButtonClicked
rows.description: This event is fired when the close button of the alert component

rows.name: onDateChange
rows.description: This event is fired when a date from the DatePicker is clicked

rows.name: open
rows.description: This option opens the notification Alert component

rows.name: color
rows.description: Alert notification color

rows.name: severity
rows.description: Alert notification severity

rows.name: message
rows.description: Alert notification message to display

rows.name: showActionButton
rows.description: This option displays or not the action button on the Alert

rows.name: showNotification
rows.description: This option allows to display or not a notification when data change

rows.name: delay
rows.description: This option allows you to define the display delay in milliseconds of the Alert

rows.name: showSearchBar
rows.description: Show or hide the search bar

rows.name: showSwitchModeButtons.showMonthButton
rows.description: Show or hide the view mode button month

rows.name: showSwitchModeButtons.showWeekButton
rows.description: Show or hide the view mode button week

rows.name: showSwitchModeButtons.showDayButton
rows.description: Show or hide the view mode button day

rows.name: showSwitchModeButtons.showTimelineButton
rows.description: Show or hide the view mode button timeline

rows.name: showDatePicker
rows.description: Show or hide the date picker buttons

rows.name: onCellClick
rows.params: event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLTableCellElement, MouseEvent>, row: any, day: any
rows.description: Triggered when clicking on a cell

rows.name: onEventsChange
rows.description: Triggered when clicking on an event

rows.name: onAlertCloseButtonClicked
rows.description: Triggers when clicking on the close button of the notification alert

rows.name: onTaskClick
rows.description: Triggers when clicking on a task event

rows.name: onDateChange
rows.params: day: number, date: number | Date | null
rows.description: Triggers when clicking on a date from the DatePicker

rows.name: id
rows.description: Unique id for every event

rows.name: color
rows.description: If not set, the primary color of the theme will be applied

rows.name: startDate
rows.description: Starting Date object of the event

rows.name: endDate
rows.description: Ending Date object of the event
